description: Extract data from cab file and hide it in an alternate data stream
author: frack113
name: Suspicious Extrac32 Alternate Data Stream Execution
query: (process.command_line.text:*extrac32.exe* AND process.command_line.text:*.cab* AND (process.command_line.text:/:/ OR process.command_line.text:/[/ OR process.command_line.text:/^/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/\/ OR process.command_line.text:/]/))
